sect1.title: OpenLink BPEL Process Manager Incoming message
sect1.para: This page shows information about the Incoming message.

simplelist.member: To view the Instance value for the Outgoing message, check value on the given list.
To view the Partner name for the Outgoing message, check value on the given list.
To view the Endpoint location for the Outgoing message, check value on the given list.
To view the Node ID value for the Outgoing message, check value on the given list.
To view the Correlation value for the Outgoing message, check value on the given list.
To sned mannualy the reply filled in the elements fields and click "Send Reply". This will go to the Debug message queue page.
To return back to Debug message queue page click "Back".
